GSD.description:
video: fbdev: sm712fb: Fix crash in smtcfb_read()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit 478154be3a8c21ff106310bb1037b1fc9d81dc62. For more details please see the references link.
